author: Danielle Desouza
description: The research was based on data from the Halifax house price index, which compared typical house prices to average earnings across the UK.
title: Average house prices in the UK are 7.1 times typical earnings
content:
House prices continue to rocket, with a typical UK home now costing more than seven times average earnings.
